origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CompetitorAPI.get_competitor_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves cloud computing data for a specified company and its competitors.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cloud computing company, e.g., TencentCloud, AlibabaCloud.'}, {'name': 'competitors', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of competitor companies.'}, {'name': 'serviceType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of cloud service, e.g., cloud computing, storage.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'The cloud computing data for the specified company and its competitors.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
然后，获取腾讯云的主要竞争对手的云计算数据。
